meanings.definition: A type of organic compound containing a ring of carbon atoms with a double bond.
meanings.sent1: Cycloolefins are important in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of various cycloolefins.
meanings.sent3: The cycloolefins at the party were the life of the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a cycloolefin, full of potential.
meanings.sent5: The structure of cycloolefins resembles a tiny, energetic circle dance.
